aandukrama wyawasthawa anuwa merata paramadhipathya balaya himi wanne janathawata misa parlimenthuwa niyojanaya karana mathi amathiwarunta nowe.widhayakaya thiranaya kara thibenne janatha paramadhipathya balaya himi janathawata eya uraga balima sandaha awakasha laba dimataya.ada wanawita widhayakaya tharamaka wyakulathwayakata pathwa atha.wyawasthadayakaya mulumaninma me osse wyakulathwaya pathwa thibe.adhikaranayada mema gataluwa hethuwen dan wyakulathwata path wemin thibena bawa pahadiliwa penenta thibe.lokaye adhikarana kriyawaliya aarambhawu mul wakawanuwe thindu laba dimedi prathamika rithi anugamanaya kaleya.nithi pothwala thada kalu akurin dakwa athi waganthi prakarawa thindu laba dima ehidi sidu keruni.
